guid.comments: string. guid, unique only within the mod. Will be turned into GUID 'mod:'+$yourModId+':'+$guid
numInstancesInDeck.comments: int >= 0 [default=1]. If > 0, the enemy will be added to draw piles.
name: Wolfhide
enemyType.comments: EnemyType::GUID. ID of the enemy type resource
isElusive.comments: (Optional) bool [default=false]. If true, MUST specify elusive data.
elusiveData.comments: (Optional) ElusiveData. only specify if 'isElusive' is true.
xpGain.comments: int >= 0. How much XP gained when defeating the enemy in battle.
reputationGain.comments: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=0]. How much reputation gained when defeating the enemy in battle.
reputationGainBonusWhenRampaging.comment: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=1]. How much additional reputation gained when defeating the enemy in battle when it is rampaging.
challengeRating.comments: (Optional) int [1-10] [default=1]. How difficult is the enemy. Used for balancing when drawing randomly and for generating Battle Tale. Check the Wiki for example ratings.

attacks.element.comments: Element::GUID. Resource ID. for the attack element
attacks.attackType.comments: (Optional) AttackType::int [default=Basic(0)]. Int value for AttackType enum.
attacks.attackModifiers.comments: (Optional) List<AttackModifier::int> [default=EMPTY]. List of modifier enum values (Poison, Cumbersome, ...)

attacks.comments: List<AttackData>. Can be empty if 'summoningAttacks' as at least one value.
summoningAttacks.comments: List<EnemyType>. Type of enemy summoned by this attack. Can be empty if 'attacks' as at least one value.
immunities.comments: List<Immunity::int>. List of immunity enum values.
resistances.comments: List<Element::GUID>. List of element Ids the enemy is resistant to.
portraitSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod enemy folder). PNG, 512x512. Shown in battle and location enemy lists.
fullBodySprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod enemy folder). PNG, 1024x1024, Outline (10px; 0,0,0). Shown in battle.
fullBodyOutlineSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod enemy folder). PNG, White, 1024x1024. Shown in battle.

tileData.tileNormalSprite.comments: string. local file path in mod enemy folder. PNG, 512x768, Outline (10px; 0,0,0), Using the map token base.
tileData.tileOutlinedSprite.comments: string. local file path in mod enemy folder. PNG, 512x768, Outline (5px; 0,255,33), outlined version of Normal.

tileData.comments: EnemyTileData. Info to represent the enemy on the map.
